text: Is there a way to get all contact property values both with and without data?
Is there and API to get data from the certifications users have? I’m not finding anything in the API overview.
<@U7AU6414J> I would think not. You can't even get user data as far as I know. The closest thing is owner data which is basically just name and email
Yeah, I’m assuming there are security issues with allowing access to this.

<@U2H3TT8F2> no. I think you would have to programmaticaly retrieve all contact properties through /properties/v1/contacts/properties then go through  /contacts/v1/lists/all/contacts/all . Join your two arrays, leaving the value blank if key from properties doesn't match any keys in the contacts record.
eh.  I think it's more of HubSpot just not seeing a big enough need.
Anyone have a good solution to copy data from a deal record to all corresponding contacts? I need to copy subscription date to a contact field and trigger renewal workflows
